REGISTRATION_AGE_ERROR_KEY: Age should be a positive value
REGISTRATION_TELEPHONE_NUMBER_ERROR_KEY: Telephone Number should have minimum 6 digits
REGISTRATION_CASTE_TEXT_ERROR_KEY: Caste should contain only alphanumeric characters
REGISTRATION_BRING_CARD_TEXT_KEY: It is quite important to bring the card to the hospital.
REGISTRATION_TAKE_MEDICINES_TEXT_KEY: Take medicines according to instructions of the doctor.
REGISTRATION_TIMINGS_TEXT_KEY: Registration Timings are from 8:30 am to 12:00 pm.
REGISTRATION_OPD_DAYS_TEXT_KEY: OPD days are on Monday, Wednesday, Friday.
REGISTRATION_SMOKING_INJURIOUS_TEXT_KEY: Smoking, Tobacco chewing can cause cancer, heart diseases and ASTHMA.
REGISTRATION_HOUSE_NUMBER_STREET_TEXT_ER: House number, street should not exceed 50 characters
REGISTRATION_VILLAGE_HEADMAN_TEXT_ERROR_: Village Headman should not exceed 250 characters
REGISTRATION_NEAREST_HEALTH_FACILITY_TO_: Nearest health facility to home should not exceed 250 characters
REGISTRATION_ADDRESS_DESCRIPTION_TEXT_ER: Address description should not exceed 250 characters
REGISTRATION_TRADITIONAL_AUTHORITY_OR_TO: Traditional Authority/Town should not exceed 250 characters
